The fault links to the sea hundreds miles from the Fast East area…incredible.

あの空間断層が、極東エリアから数百キロも離れた地点に繋がってるなんて……不思議ね。

Bronya said before…the final war with Herrscher was here five years ago…so this is the battlefield.

5年前、律者との最後の戦いは聖フレイヤ学園で起きたってブローニャが言ってたわ……つまり、ここがその戦場。
5년 전, 율자와의 마지막 전투는 세인트 프레야 학원에서 일어났다고 브로냐가 말했어…… 즉, 여기가 그 전장.
Bronya told me that the last battle with the Herrschers happened at St. Freya's Academy five years ago... This must be that place.
The last battle with the Herrscher during the Great Collapse five years ago was fought at St. Freya's Academy...that means this was the battlefield at that time?
Five years ago, Bronya told me that the last battle with the scribes happened at St. Freya's Academy. ...... I mean, this is the battlefield.

不会错的…这里的崩坏能浓度很高，也就只有律者核心可以散发出这么强烈的崩坏能了。
間違いないわ……ここの崩壊エネルギーの濃度、かなり高いもの。ここまで強烈な崩壊エネルギーを出せるのは、律者コアくらいよ。

There is no mistake...the concentration of disintegration energy here is very high, and only the Ruler Core can give off such strong disintegration energy.
There's no doubt about it. ...... The concentration of decay energy here, is quite high. Only a ritotron core can produce such intense decay energy.

チッ、そう言うのは簡単だけどよぉ、律者コアをこんな広い場所から探し出すなんて、簡単じゃないぞ？
쳇, 그렇게 말하는 건 쉽지만 말야, 율자 코어를 이렇게 넓은 곳에서 찾아내는 건 쉽지 않다고！
Cut, you say lightly, this place is so big, the Herrscher core so big things which are so easy to find!

Right…Bronya is right, there is a big fight between Schicsial and Anti-Entropy, and the Moonlight Therone fell in the school…like this.
果然…布洛妮娅说的没错，看来这座圣芙蕾雅学园中的确发生过一场天命与逆熵的大战，在这场战斗中月光王座坠落在了学园中…变成了我们现在看到的样子。
やっぱりね……ブローニャの言った通り、この聖フレイヤ学園では確かに天命とネゲントロピーの戦いがあったんだわ。あの戦闘で月光王座は学園に墜落して……そして、今、私たちの目の前にある通りの状態になった。
역시……브로냐가 말한 대로, 이 세인트 프레야 학원에서는 확실히 천명과 네겐트로피의 싸움이 있었던 거야. 그 전투에서 월광왕좌는 학원에 추락해서…… 그리고 지금, 우리 눈앞에 있는 이런 상태가 된 거네.

Sure enough...Bronya was right, it seems that a great battle between the Mandate of Heaven and the reverse entropy did take place in this St. Freya's school, in which the Moonlight Throne fell in the school...and became what we see now.

I knew it,...... Bronya was right, there was indeed a battle between the Heavenly Life and the Negentropy here at St. Freya's Academy. The Moonlight Throne crashed into the school in that battle,...... and it is now as we see it.
